Wondrous Item, Rare (Requires Attunement)
Exactly where the Calipha’s Tear came from or why it was made have long since been lost in the mists of time. It is unquestionably a lovely item, a pale blue-white gem that gives off a faint glow. Surely its reputation is exaggerated?
While attuned to this item, you have advantage on all Charisma skill checks.
Curse. This item is cursed. Attuning to it curses you until you are targeted by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.XZhdgVK3cLoxNCQl]{remove curse} spell or similar magic. Removing the item fails to end the curse on you. Whenever you fail a Wisdom skill check, the curse causes you to have disadvantage on all subsequent Wisdom skill checks until after you’ve taken a long rest.
